verbose_text: To assess the impact of CHD4 deletion on plasmablast differentiation in vivo, we used an intravenous immunization model with LPS, a T independent sub-type 1 (TI-1) antigen that induces a rapid induction of B220 lo CD138 + plasmablasts in the spleen of immunized animals.
evidence: antigen that induces a rapid induction of B220 lo  CD138
